short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Searches for and finds words then clicks on all of them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search for and find a word or a list of words and click on them. there's also an option to search first which will only highlight the search words and then a click button that allows you to click on the highlighted words.
